title: forgot my old hotmail and i want 2 change it any help
body: so i changed my email about 6 months but i forgot how the email was and now i want 2 change it back but it sends a passcode 2 my old email adress any help?!!!

replies.body: We may be able to assist with changing or verifying your email.  Please reach out to our account team by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll respond asap!  Thanks for your patience!
porocles what category should i put my ticket into too

Direct link to Riot’s [Account Support Centre.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


* Under the secondary select **Account.**


* For the tertiary category select **Management.**




http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/de/Kayle_SilverSkin_Ch.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111029070156
To have Player Support assist you with changing your email, please submit an account recovery [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
